tasks.task:
#Cutadapt folder if [ ! -d "${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ctdOut}" ]; then echo "Creating the directory for the Cutadapt results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ctdOut}/ else echo "${ctdOut} already exist"; echo "Removing ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ctdOut} directory and files..." rm -Rf ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ctdOut}/ echo "Creating the directory for the Cutadapt results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ctdOut}/ fi
#Bowtie folder if [ ! -d "${workingDir}/${outDir}/${bwtOut}" ]; then echo "Creating the directory for the Bowtie results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${bwtOut}/ else echo "${bwtOut} already exist"; echo "Removing ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${bwtOut} directory and files..." rm -Rf ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${bwtOut}/ echo "Creating the directory for the Bowtie results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${bwtOut}/ fi
#QualiMap folder if [ ! -d "${workingDir}/${outDir}/${qmOut}" ]; then echo "Creating the directory for the QualiMap results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${qmOut}/ else echo "${qmOut} already exist"; echo "Removing ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${qmOut} directory and files..." rm -Rf ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${qmOut}/ echo "Creating the directory for the QualyMap results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${qmOut}/ fi
#FeatureCounts folder if [ ! -d "${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ftqOut}" ]; then echo "Creating the directory for the FeatureCounts results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ftqOut}/ else echo "${ftqOut} already exist"; echo "Removing ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ftqOut} directory and files..." rm -Rf ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ftqOut}/ echo "Creating the directory for the FeatureCounts results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${ftqOut}/ fi
#DESeq2 folder if [ ! -d "${workingDir}/${outDir}/${dsqOut}" ]; then echo "Creating the directory for the DESeq2 results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${dsqOut}/ else echo "${dsqOut} already exist"; echo "Removing ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${dsqOut} directory and files..." rm -Rf ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${dsqOut}/ echo "Creating an empty directory for DESeq2 results" mkdir -p ${workingDir}/${outDir}/${dsqOut}/ fi
rm -rf ${workingDir}/compi_scripts mkdir -p ${workingDir}/compi_scripts cp ${scriptsDir}/${deSeq2Rscript} ${workingDir}/compi_scripts/${deSeq2Rscript}
tasks.foreach:
echo "Removing the adapter with Cutadapt: ${file}"
docker run --rm \ -v ${hostWorkingDir}:/data \ pegi3s/cutadapt:${cutadaptVersion} \ -m 1 \ -a ${adapter} \ -o /data/${outDir}/${ctdOut}/trimmed_${file} \ data/${dataDir}/${file}

bw_fastq="/data/${outDir}/${ctdOut}/${file}" bw_fastq=$(echo $bw_fastq | tr -s '/') #convert the path to single slash
bw_output="data/${outDir}/${bwtOut}/${file}.sam" bw_output=$(echo $bw_output | tr -s '/') #convert the path to single slash
bw_index=$(ls -1 ${workingDir}/${bwtIndex} | head -n1 | sed 's/\..\.ebwt//' | sed 's@\(.*\)@'${workingDir}/${bwtIndex}'\/\1@') #gets the root of the index file name bw_index=$(echo $bw_index | tr -s '/') bw_index=$(echo $bw_index | cut -d / -f 3- | awk '{print "/data/" $0}')
#test if the file exist, if so removes it if [ -f "${bw_output}" ]; then echo "${file}.sam already exists, removing ${file}.sam." rm -f "${bw_output}" fi
echo "Performing the alignment of ${file}.sam"
docker run --rm \ -v ${hostWorkingDir}:/data \ pegi3s/bowtie1:${bowtieVersion} \ bowtie -S \ ${bw_index} \ ${bw_fastq} \ ${bw_output}

bam_output="${workingDir}/${outDir}/${bwtOut}/" bam_output="$(echo $bam_output | tr -s '/')"
filebam=$(echo ${file} | sed 's/\.sam//') filebam=$(echo $filebam | tr -s '/')
#test if the file exist, if so removes it if [ -f "${bam_output}/${filebam}.bam" ]; then echo "${filebam}.bam already exists, removing ${filebam}.bam and ${filebam}.bam.bai." rm -f "${bam_output}/${filebam}.bam*" fi
#replaces $working_dir with /data/ bam_output=$(echo $bam_output | cut -d / -f 3- | awk '{print "/data/" $0}')
echo "Converting ${filebam}.sam to bam." docker run --rm \ -v ${hostWorkingDir}:/data \ pegi3s/samtools_bcftools:${samtoolsVersion} \ sh -c "samtools sort "${bam_output}${file}" > "${bam_output}${filebam}.bam"" \ sh -c "samtools index "${bam_output}${filebam}.bam""

bam_input="/data/${outDir}/${bwtOut}/${bamFile}" annotations="/data/${gffFile}" qm_output="output/${qmOut}/${bamFile}"
docker run --rm\ -v ${hostWorkingDir}:/data \ pegi3s/qualimap:${qualimapVersion} \ sh -c "qualimap rnaseq -bam ${bam_input} -gtf ${annotations} -outdir ${qm_output} -outfile ${bamFile}.pdf --java-mem-size=4G"
tasks.task:
bam_input="/data/${outDir}/${bwtOut}/" bam_input=$(echo $bam_input | tr -s '/')
path_output="/data/${outDir}/${ftqOut}/" path_output=$(echo $path_output | tr -s '/')
docker run --rm \ -v ${hostWorkingDir}:/data \ pegi3s/feature-counts:${featureCountsVersion} \ sh -c "featureCounts -a /data/${gffFile} -o "${path_output}/all-counts.txt" "${bam_input}"*".bam""
